# Track Inventory And Add Inventory Change

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/track-inventory-and-add-inventory-change/

## Category
07 Products And Inventory

## Subcategory
N/A

## Content

### Overview
This article explains how to track and add inventory changes in Mangomint's Products app.

### How to Add Inventory Changes
To add a product inventory change:
1. Open the Products app
2. Select the product
3. Select "Add Change"
4. Choose the type of inventory change

### Types of Inventory Changes

**Received Stock:** Record new inventory that was received into stock.

**Recount:** Recount the inventory to ensure accuracy.

**Professional Use:** Enter the number of units used by a staff member or for backbar items (products used during service delivery but not sold directly to clients).

**Other:** Record other types of inventory changes not covered by the above categories.

For each change, you can add a description for your reference to track why the inventory was adjusted.

### Related Features
- Inventory reports help track product inventory changes and product usage
- Integration with the Products app for streamlined inventory management

## Article Content

HOME
PRODUCTS & INVENTORY
Add Inventory Change

To add a product inventory change, open the Products app and select the product.

Select Add Change and select the type of inventory change.

Received Stock: Select this option to record new inventory that was received.

Recount: Select this option to recount the inventory.

Professional Use: Select this option to enter the number of units used by a staff member or for backbar items.

Other: Select this option for other inventory changes. You can add a description for your reference.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
